products.title: Faux Suede Deluxe Powder Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Their faux suede deluxe range of fabric has proven to be one of their most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. Still, at the forefront of fashion, the fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains. The faux suede deluxe powder blue roman blind in a lovely colour is an excellent way to transform your home at an affordable price. Product id: db-rom0012 fabric colour: powder blue material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Faux Suede Deluxe Black Roman Blind
products.description: Simple yet stylish the black faux suede roman blind is the perfect finish for both the modern contemporaryhome. Their faux suede collection comes in a variety of colours which include pinks, naturals and tones of colour which are highly sought after in todays interiors. All their blinds are made to measure to your measurements right here in west yorkshire. Their skilled seamstresses hold a wealth of experience, so you can be assured that a quality roman blind will be manufactured and delivered to you.

products.title: Faux Suede Deluxe New Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Chic and on trend for today's living, the new grey faux suede blind will enhance your room interior. Its trending grey tone brings a crisp classy look that is perfect for any room in your home. Pair it perfectly with several colour palettes, including blush pinks, mustard yellows, and whites. This blind is great along side co-ordinating and contrasting curtains to give your window that perfect look.
